DOC.brief_summary: This study examine relationship maternal body composition , placental function , fetal nutrition body composition , seek determine accurate method maternal body composition analysis late pregnancy .
DOC.brief_title: Maternal Body Composition Regulates Placental Function
DOC.detailed_description: This study examine relationship maternal body composition , placental function , fetal nutrition body composition , seek determine accurate method maternal body composition analysis late pregnancy . This project integrate body composition analysis , nutrition , metabolic factor study impact maternal body composition diet placental function fetal growth . Research Project : The propose enrollment 41 pregnant woman term ( > 37 week gestation ) complete September 2013 . The subject underwent four body composition measurement ( bioelectrical impedance , skin-fold thickness , BodPod , deuterium dilution ) dietary survey along fast blood draw . The subject return 2 week postpartum repeat measurement along DEXA scan .
DOC.criteria: Healthy pregnant woman term singleton gestation Medical condition require daily medication Fetal congenital anomaly Diabetes
